      • EXIF_HEADER_OFFSET

        public static final int EXIF_HEADER_OFFSET
        Byte offset at starting point of IFD offset (TIFF header). Referencing of the IFD offset position references the IFD offset value plus this value. SOI (2 bytes) + APP1 marker (2 bytes) + APP1 size (2 bytes) + Exif identification code (6 bytes) = 12 bytes
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExifReader

        public ExifReader(java.io.File file)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  ExifReadException
        Reads the data of the JPEG file specified as an argument.
        Parameters:
        file - The JPEG file to be read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Reading of the file failed
        ExifReadException - Reading of the EXIF data failed
